entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Loc]With .NET 7 SDK, the description about "--disable-build-servers" is unlocalized when running "dotnet build --help" in CLI on locale OS. #24040
  • Unlisted packages are still installed via `dotnet tool install` without `--version` despite correctly not showing up in `dotnet tool search` #24037

Closed

  • Trailing \ or / will fail for path parameters for `dotnet test` #23970
  • self-contained warning should be suppressed for iOS #23705
    6.0.3xx

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add docs for workloads #23895
  • Fix escaping function when argument ends with odd number of backslashes #23988
    Area-DotNet Test
  • Enable artifacts post processing #24035
    Area-DotNet Test

Updated

  • [WorkloadInstall] Simplify code workload install command line #24028
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1624232 #23858
    Area-Infrastructure
